thread.title: Sandra Bullock Applauds Jennifer Lawrence for Gender Wage Gap Essay
thread.title_full: Sandra Bullock Applauds Jennifer Lawrence for Gender Wage Gap Essay

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Sandra Bullock Applauds Jennifer Lawrence for Gender Wage Gap Essay
text:
Comments The 'Our Brand Is Crisis' actress calls JLaw's op-ed about gender equal pay 'brave, beautiful, right on.' 
Sandra Bullock praised Jennifer Lawrence after the latter wrote an essay about sexism in Hollywood. During a press tour for her newest movie " Our Brand Is Crisis ", Bullock called Lawrence's op-ed "brave, beautiful, right on." "I think you need someone like Jennifer Lawrence who's hugely respected and successful to stop and say 'You know what? I know I've got all these blessings but here are the facts ... It still happens to me'," said the " Gravity " actress as quoted by Reuters. "My question isn't so much about the wage because the wage gap, it's a result of something bigger," she added. "I've said this so many times but no-one can give me an answer or wants to answer, which is 'why are women thought of as less than? Why have we allowed that thought?' and I am blaming myself as well."
